page.title: 17Fashions in Patchway
page.content: I wear dresses most of the time in the summer, or shorts. On rainy days, I wear jeans and sweat shirts. Today I am wearing a skirt and a T-shirt. The colour of my skirt is pink and a white T-shirt. I have three pairs of shorts, one red, one green and one white. I have lots of dresses and jumpers. I have a jogging suit and many blouses. In the winter I wear jumpers and jeans. When I go out to play I wear coats, scarves, gloves, boots and a hat. The most fashionable trainers are either white baseball boots or top name daps. For trousers we wear "Baggies", which are trousers which are tight around the ankles and waist and baggy around the legs. They have about five pockets which all have zips on them. We also wear sweatshirts. We also have anoracks.
